'''Badema''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Standing within the cage is a Huana woman, clad in bedraggled clothing and covered in numerous scrapes and scratches. She clutches at the bars as you approach. Badema was captured together with the rest of her trading crew and almost eaten, until the Watcher intervened.
